citations.narrative:
In the enclosure housing one Moluccan cockatoo, there are no perches available for the bird to rest on comfortably. The
inspector witnessed the cockatoo perching on the metal support beam for the primary enclosure wall, causing the bird to
have to press against the chain link fencing.
Appropriate perching for birds is required so that they can perform their normal species behaviors. Failure to provide
species appropriate perches may result in discomfort and foot related injuries. The facility must provide perching for birds
that rest by perching. Furniture-type objects such as perches must be species appropriate and designed and maintained
so that they prevent harm to the bird.
To be corrected by 18 March 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

3.153(a)(2) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
In the enclosure housing one Moluccan cockatoo, there are no perches available for the bird to rest on comfortably. The

have to press against the chain link fencing. 
Appropriate perching for birds is required so that they can perform their normal species behaviors. Failure to provide 
species appropriate perches may result in discomfort and foot related injuries. The facility must provide perching for birds 
that rest by perching. Furniture-type objects such as perches must be species appropriate and designed and maintained 
so that they prevent harm to the bird. 
To be corrected by 18 March 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
